description:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/4430/

If the instance can't be unrescued, the instance will hang out in rescued forever.

The fix is to put the instance in the ERROR state so it can be deleted.
title: Unrescue doesnt error out instance when it fails

comments.content:
http://paste.openstack.org/show/4430/

If the instance can't be unrescued, the instance will hang out in rescued forever.

The fix is to put the instance in the ERROR state so it can be deleted.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris
